title: #302:  LuAnn Is High On Life!
description:
"Real Housewives of New York City" is on TV, which means we have another fun podcast. This episode, we discuss the fat tipsy bitches, LuAnn on the verge, and the Real Housewives of Orange County Uncensored. Come listen!

00:04:13 - Mailbag
00:19:27 - RHONY
01:20:10 - Gossip
01:25:03 - RHOC Uncensored

author: watchwhatcrappens@gmail.com (Ben Mandelker & Ronnie Karam)
